resolution_details.location: Galeries Aylmer Parking Lot, Gatineau, QC
resolution_details.how_found: Responding to TIP-004, patrol units located vehicle in parking lot. Child was safely recovered from vehicle. Suspect apprehended inside mall attempting to purchase items.
resolution_details.child_status: Safe and unharmed. Child reunited with parents. Undergoing medical evaluation as precaution.
resolution_details.suspect_status: In custody. Identified as Marcus Chen, 34, no prior relationship to family. Charges pending: child abduction, unlawful confinement.

system_performance.geo_intelligence_accuracy: Predicted North Corridor (85% confidence) - actual location was 11.8km south, within extended search radius
system_performance.ai_verification_accuracy: Correctly prioritized TIP-002 (91%) and TIP-004 (95%) as high confidence
system_performance.event_driven_response: All agents responded autonomously to events, no manual coordination required
system_performance.time_to_resolution: 2h 15min from alert issue to child safe

outcome.evidence_collected: Vehicle impounded, mall security footage secured, witness statements recorded

resolution_types.found_deceased: Child found but did not survive
resolution_types.suspect_arrested: Suspect in custody, child status varies
resolution_types.false_alarm: Alert issued in error, no actual abduction
resolution_types.cancelled: Child returned on own or custody dispute resolved
resolution_types.aged_out: Alert cancelled - child turned 18 or situation resolved
